documents.document:
FinCEN Extends Its Jurisdiction More than Foreign MSBs

Eventually, right after virtually two a long time of discussions, FinCEN, the division of the Section of the Treasury dealing with monetary crimes, in its administrative operate above the Bank Secrecy Act, enacted a new regulation that extends its protection exterior of the borders of the United States. (31 CFR 1022.380)

On July 21st, FinCEN posted in their Official Publication the new regulation referred to as "Definitions and other rules related to funds service businesses" (MSBs).

This new regulation is divided into several areas. The 1st focuses on the definition of MSBs, which is dependent on pursuits earlier founded by FinCEN and concludes that this definition should also implement for international companies that carry out the same activities irrespective of wherever they are situated or how usually they perform organization.

One more situation is connected to the way to prolong its jurisdiction to international firms. For this it states that companies that fall under the definition of MSBs that do business with the United States in any way (significant or totally) will have to comply with a number of demands:

one. Register as an MSB with FinCEN. For this objective, and in purchase to facilitate this registration, the on the web reporting system that has been used for money transaction reports as well as for suspicious routines is now prolonged to these companies to complete the registration.

two. As an integral part of registering with FinCEN, the firm should sign-up brokers as effectively.

three. Designate an agent who resides in the United States to serve as a get in touch with amongst FinCEN and the MSB. This individual will take legal notices and other documents connected to the Bank Secrecy Act. This agent really should supply an deal with to obtain these notices and preserve exact information.

four. On registering as an MSB in the United States, the MSB immediately has the obligation of setting up policies and techniques that not only comply with the specifications founded by their own nation but that also comply with the requirements set up for MSBs in the United States.

5. Within these particular methods is the reporting of money transactions of much more than 10 thousand American bucks (US $10,000). In the exact same way, they really should report suspicious activities as outlined by the laws of the United States.

6. Yet another critical issue that applies to foreign MSBs is that they are topic to audits under Title 31 carried out by FinCEN, who has licensed the Internal Income Company (IRS) to conduct inspections on the implementation of anti-money laundering packages (AML) by the MSBs.

Other factors have to do with distinct sorts of funds corporations. 1 improvement is that there is no much more talk of currency exchange organizations, but they have removed the expression "currency" to make the exercise more common. It does not include only pursuits involving exchanging bodily funds but also the trade of funds by means of other instruments that have a financial denomination that aren't usually tangible, specifically now with all of the instruments in retailers each day that have financial value without automatically becoming funds.

Clarifications have lastly been produced about every single of the varieties of operations attainable for MSBs: Foreign currency trade companies, examine cashing businesses, and businesses that concern or offer money orders.

FinCEN also mentions "saved value", instruments of stored price (like prepaid cards, etc) and assigns them a classification impartial of other economic instruments like traveler's checks and money orders.

They have also elaborated on the definition of funds transfer organizations, and expanded it to incorporate organizations that transfer not only money but also money or any other component of worth that can substitute cash.

This new regulation surely turns out to be very ambiguous and, at first look, it generates a series of doubts about its functional application. Whilst it is accurate that for the authorities of the United States the combat against income laundering is crucial, and in many instances funds service companies have served as instruments to this result, making an attempt to regulate monetary functions around the world via MSBs will be difficult.

The United States is a multicultural place and has company relations with far more than one hundred fifty nations around the world of the 196 in the world. United States greatest money transfer business (WU) reports funds transfers to much more than 200 nations around the world in the globe (there are in fact a variety of international locations that belong to other nations around the world but they are generally noticed as unbiased international locations) which suggests that the MSBs of 200 nations, if they have any relation with the United States (long term or transient), will have to comply with this regulation. This is inconceivable specially contemplating that in several countries there is not a local regulation for these activities.

Yet another crucial facet to contemplate is if FinCEN, who has delegated authority to the IRS to perform critiques of these companies, is well prepared to answer to all of the critiques that would arrive if this regulation was totally approved. In apply it is distinct that the personnel that is accessible to carry out the reviews of funds services corporations exterior of the United States is insufficient and could rarely assert to prolong its functionality outdoors the borders.

The scope and coverage of this regulation in apply also generates doubts about its actual coverage. Are these firms obligated to inform FinCEN about all of their internal functions that aren't connected to organization with the United States? Are IRS officers acquainted with the monetary way of life of international locations that barely show up on the map? In practice it is normal for us as consultants to sit down and explain to them why particular sorts of routines that in the United States constitutes a suspicious activity, in other countries are regular techniques. This indicates that we really should produce a one global idea about suspicious routines.

But let's shift on from the notion that every single place will comply with this regulation and as a substitute feel about a useful placing where a funds transfer company in Beijing that sells some income to a firm in California detects a suspicious action and offers their suspicious activity report in Mandarin.

Does this suggest that we're now dealing with a multilingual organization? Or can we conclude that one more of the demands for this regulation is that English is mandatory?

Not to note no matter whether we are prepared to obtain and assess suspicious action studies, because in 2010 they acquired much more than seven hundred,000 suspicious action reviews and practically 50 percent corresponded with funds service corporations. If we don't forget the character of this report, which is being able to detect and avoid criminal pursuits that could represent terrorism, funds laundering or any other type of crime, it is unattainable to feel that they are actually capable of analyzing 300,000 suspicious exercise studies from the United States, and even a lot more not possible that they can look into all the studies that arrive from overseas. Not to point out the environment of sanctions when a organization in the Congo, for example, fails to present their cash transaction reports. Will FinCEN resolve the corresponding very good? And if not, isn't going to that represent a apply unequal from an American organization that commits the same offense and is fined?

In conclusion, it must be stressed that the purpose of this regulation is excellent, but the signifies are undoubtedly not the very best. FinCEN owes many answers that ought to have been studied and reviewed before publishing this regulation. The outcome of these sorts of ambiguous polices is always the very same, the software is topic to the interpretation of each and every personal agent on shift, which might not be the finest interpretation.

Juan C. Villa
Accredited Anti-Income Laundering Expert

AML Compliance Remedies, Inc.
Bank Secrecy Act, Anti-Money Laundering Compliance Consultants

5201 Blue Lagoon Dr. Suite 964
Miami, FL 33126
Toll Totally free 855-AML-Group Fax 888-538-1199

Entire world Class Support - In a Automobile Dealership?

When we think of planet-class company, images of luxury hotels and nation clubs typically fill our minds. What about auto dealerships? I know what you must be thinking..."certainly he implies a Bentley dealership or some other best-line car". Not so...I am referring to a basic automobile dealership that sells and services medium-priced autos, like what you'd locate in most neighborhoods. In this circumstance, the automobile dealership is five minutes from where I live, and they never cease to amaze me with how specialist and service-centric they are.

This month's service administration tip is "any leader in any business can develop a team of service professionals". That's right...it does not issue if it is a grocery store, a mall retail outlet, or in this situation, a neighborhood vehicle dealership. To no one's shock, the dealership's Common Manager (GM) is the leader I am referencing right here. A number of Saturdays ago, I took my vehicle in to get its quarterly company, and since they ended up fairly total that day, the company affiliate empowered himself to supply me a rental vehicle for the day even though my auto was being labored on. I was then escorted over to the sales side of the operation, in which I was supplied a seat. While waiting for the revenue agent to commence the paperwork for the complimentary rental, I witnessed some thing quite effective. The GM summoned for the total team to collect close to for their morning "huddle". In this huddle, the GM thanked his staff for their ongoing dedication to company excellence and cited precise examples of staff members likely out of their way to generate memorable encounters. He then defined the relevance of "connecting" with every buyer and producing them come to feel welcomed, appreciated, and cared for. This was adopted by asking if absolutely everyone had their nametags. After noticing that about four staff members did not have it, he promptly requested them to go away and get them (message: your services expectations are non-negotiable). He then expended the following five or so minutes conducting position-plays with each and every staff member on offering a heat welcome.

At the conclude of the huddle (which didn't previous more than ten minutes), absolutely everyone was enthusiastic to engage each other and the consumers. Most importantly, the mantra of company excellence was driven as tough as it could be from the leading chief. When I requested one of the group members if the huddle is carried out each day, she replied, "absolutely". Not amazingly, this dealership's partitions had been adorned with several awards for company.

From my viewpoint, below are a handful of components that stood out in the service experience, and how much they likely price the dealership to produce:

-Employing my identify = $.00

-Handshake = $.00

-Crew member supplying me their personal telephone extension, seeking me in the eye and declaring "make sure you phone me if you need anything else" = $.00

-Expressing "wait around right here even though I deliver your automobile around" = $.00

-Remembering me and proactively inquiring about earlier vehicle concerns to confirm that they are no longer a hindrance = $.00

You get the photo, most service standards that generate world-course services don't value a factor. The only price tag is the senior leader committing to him/herself to keep company excellence as the ultimate reflection of organizational good results. In good moments and undesirable...in slow occasions and hectic times...anticipations must be very clear and accountability has to be strong. If the climate is set by the chief, the workplace engagement and service delivery turn out to be much a lot more participating and satisfying for all included.

My obstacle to you is to commit to becoming the support benchmark in your market. There is completely no purpose why that can not be attained. With the proper dedication, whichever will get concentrated on ultimately improves. Allow 2007 be the yr where you target on deciding on service-centric staff, orienting them the appropriate way, let them know what's expected of them, and supply enough suggestions along the way (be sure to don't wait around right up until the annual appraisal to do so). Require these closest to the motion in developing/revising your support expectations and be confident to reward excellent functionality...keep in mind, the finest way to replicate excellent overall performance is to focus on outstanding functionality.

Written by Bryan K. Williams

Glucosamine And MSM

Glucosamine and MSM (Methyl Sulfonyl Methane) are the most broadly employed normal health supplements for those looking for therapy for discomfort reduction, irritation and tissue repair. Glucosamine, the basis for the development of chondroitin mends harmed cartilage by stimulating the cartilage cells to make glycosaminoglycans and proteoglycans. Research have proven that glucosamine is in a position to slow down the development of osteoarthritis.

Glucosamine is a small molecule and is very easily absorbed by the human mobile. Researches conducted have exposed the absorption charge of glucosamine sulfate to be 98 percent when in comparison to chondroitin sulfate that is much less than 8 %. Glucosamine has quite number of aspect consequences and can be consumed as drugs or in the liquid type, administered by way of intramuscular injections and of late via topical formulation. Glucosamine is essential for healthful skin. A adequate quantity of glucosamine in the blood is needed to create hyaluronic acid that is necessary to heal pores and skin accidents.

MSM (Methyl Sulfonyl Methane) is a organic sulfur compound identified in all living items. MSM was isolated by researchers Robert Herschelr and Dr. Stanley Jacob of the College of Oregon Health care College in the eighties. It was observed that the sulfur existing in MSM named sulfonyl is innocuous and as essential as vitamin Do in our eating plans. MSM originates in the sea and reaches us through rainfall. It is odorless, h2o-soluble and crystalline in naturel. It is current in typical meals like raw milk, meat, fish, fruits, vegetables and grains.

MSM adds versatility to mobile walls and enhances suppleness of tissues. It is employed to deal with muscle discomfort and is valuable for arthritis associated discomforts. It is normally utilised in blend with glucosamine and chondroitin to deal with arthritis proficiently. Making use of MSM and glucosamine leads to delicate facet results like nausea, abdomen pain and stomach upsets but the positive aspects offset the negatives to a great extent.

Glucosamine [http://www.e-Glucosamine.com] gives detailed data on Glucosamine, Glucosamine Chondroitin, Glucosamine Sulfate, Liquid Glucosamine and more. Glucosamine is affiliated with Hip Joint Discomfort [http://www.e-JointPain.com].

five Ought to-Have Goods for Car Dealer Revenue Departments

It will take a whole lot to hold a successful automotive dealership product sales ground jogging, hunting refreshing and prepared to be loaded with customers. For a seller income flooring to the two look fantastic and run smoothly, it requirements to be effectively-structured as effectively as marked, and that implies employing vehicle supplies to keep a method in place. Automobile sellers really should maintain offices stocked with essential product sales floor supplies in purchase to be properly-prepared. The subsequent five objects are some of the most generally employed or crucial product sales supplies, vital for maintaining essential documentation, trying to keep inventory arranged, incentivizing employees and - one particular of the most crucial task of a automobile sales whole lot - for drawing consideration!

Windshield & Mirror Sales Concept Dangle Tags & Stickers

Interior entrance windshield stickers tell possible clients critical details about automobiles on the income floor, even from the road. Most window shield stickers are employed to present auto product calendar year info, but they can also be utilized to get in touch with attention to other car functions, this sort of as mileage details, CARFAX, four wheel push and many other people. Likewise, mirror hang tags are colourful paper tags hung in automobile rearview mirrors calling interest to marketing points, these kinds of as price tag, $ for every month, revenue pricing, funding information, clearance and other people. Amongst windshield stickers and mirror hang tags, buyers can know every thing they want to make a sale at a glance.

Odometer Disclosure Assertion

Federal regulation and, in several cases, state regulation also, requires the vendor of a vehicle to complete an Odometer Disclosure Statement at the time of the car's sale, unless of course the automobile is mature than ten years previous. The odometer details on the kind must be correct, and it ought to be signed by both the purchaser and the vendor. vehicle dealerships need to have to guard by themselves from liability by finishing odometer disclosure statements carefully at each and every package, which signifies keeping plenty of them on hand in the sales division!

Custom Important Tags

A simple approach for retaining customer recognition for the two automobile service and potential purchases, handing out new keys attached to customized, branded essential tags is regular dealership working procedure. Soft, versatile tailor made key tags with the automobile dealer's brand and organization speak to info operate very best for retaining long term business.

Snooper Booster Funds Incentive Board

Money incentive boards support preserve income personnel encouraged, and they're great for business morale. Snooper Booster money incentive boards are basic pull-absent boards with 50 pulls and area for each personnel to publish down his or her title each and every time they pull. A standard reward for revenue - typically sellers established incentives at $one hundred in product sales for each pull - pulls spend out $1 to $5 every single, for a complete of $85 additionally the jackpot for the personnel with the most pulls for each board.

Swooper Flags & Great deal Decorations

No vehicle vendor sales whole lot is full with out some consideration-grabbing decorations. Swooper flags are amid the most well-known for dealership heaps, wonderful for exhibiting essential revenue messages from the roadside. Smaller paddle flags, checker flags and banner flags get in touch with attention to particular automobiles, while air-blown sky dancers and communication tubes grab focus for genuinely particular product sales occasions.

Upgrade and Rebuild Not Change Your Rechargeable Battery

Rechargeable batteries for cordless gadgets are a blessing and a curse. What specifically does that imply? When new and functioning properly they enable a cordless electrical power device, notebook computer radio managed automobile, cellphone or portable vac to be employed in regions for lengths of time undreamed of only ten to twenty several years back. That would be the blessing element of the prior statement. The curse will come immediately after what would seem like a small time the battery will start to drop electrical power with a lot less and less use. Previous to this 12 months there ended up only two attainable solutions for this. 1st buy a new battery ideally with an upgraded amperage rating or rebuild the current battery using upgraded inside cells. A new upgraded 18 volt DeWalt drill battery sells in retail operations for anywhere between $100 to $a hundred and fifteen. The aged battery need to be recycled in an accepted manner using up treasured space in landfills and so forth as only certain elements of the total can be reused. The second strategy entailed rebuilding the inside factors ( sub C cells ). Connecting them with nickel tabs both soldered or spot welded jointly to replicate the first condition.Soldering is by far and big the most typical strategy as most DIY"ers with the expertise to attempt this have a soldering gun. The welding is carried out by an industry certain unit usable only for this procedure and costing in the community of $10,000. Only the biggest contractors with a lot of batteries to rebuild could justify this sort of an price. Soldering, although alright as a approach generates warmth on the cell in extra of 550 levels.Temperatures this higher can cause thermal runaway in the mobile and subsequent distending of the wall and or explosion.

Nowadays in 2011 there are far better methods to complete this. Patent pending mechanical connections are place welded on the terminal stops of these cells and equipped along with the maximum top quality Sort 201 reliable impeccable connectors for a straightforward rebuild and improve on both a job web site or workshop.

These kits come regular for voltages from four.8V by means of 36V in possibly two.one amp or 3.2 amp kinds.These kits incorporate everything you need to improve standard one.seven amp OEM provided batteries to thirty% to fifty% additional ability in thirty minutes or significantly less.The active battery rebuild kits are not only tops in protecting cash and time but also the surroundings as the expended cells are 100% recyclable into their authentic factors and subsequent reuse in new cells.

Evening Eyesight Goggles - What Do They Genuinely See?

If you have never ever tried using on a pair of evening eyesight eyeglasses but always puzzled what it would be like to see in the dim, you may have just identified your response. Infrared technological innovation - the same point that is utilized in evening eyesight viewers can also be utilised with your everyday Electronic-SLR digicam.

Infrared photography is an fascinating trick influence that you can do with your digicam with the straightforward addition of a screw-on infrared filter. You do not need the extra equipment of Photoshop or any other editing computer software, the electronics of your camera is all you want.

Now that currently being said, I do have to offer you the codicil that all cameras are ready to acquire infrared pictures but all cameras also have an infrared light blocking filter in entrance of the camera's sensor. Some of these filters are extremely powerful and block out all infrared gentle whilst other cameras will enable some infrared light to pass via. You will have to experiment a bit to decide the sensitivity of your camera's blocking filter.

As long as your digicam is 1 that permits some IR light to move, by inserting a screw-on IR filter in entrance of your lens will end result in you obtaining some very dramatic cool searching photographs.

Infrared light-weight is a spectrum of light-weight that the human eye can not see. It is also used in health care diagnostic equipment and other industrial devices.

This technique provides a really strong distinction increase and will truly punch up some visual components of your image. For example, clouds in the sky will consider on robust distinct edges and seem more vivid than they truly are. The sky will look darker and the clouds will get lighter but daring.

Infrared photography also does some quite interesting factors to character pictures. All grass, plants and leaves end up turning pure white almost as if they have a coating of snow on them.

All pictures of individuals acquire on a distinctive search as properly. Some would say these men and women occur from a different planet, simply because all of their hair is blue in shade. Any facial markings like freckles or pimples just seem to be to fade absent leaving behind a perfectly easy complexion. Surprisingly although, eyes will typically appear black.

Photographic tips and particular results are a reward that goes alongside with possessing a excellent DSLR camera. The technology of night eyesight goggles doesn't have to be seen just be in the newest Hollywood blockbuster.

This is just an additional of several resources you can have in your photographer's toolbox.

Projector Headlights Rewards

We rely a great deal on our capability to see, specifically when driving auto cars. If you very own a automobile, you surely comprehend how crucial very good eyesight can be for your security. Quality car headlights are mandatory if you want to be able to travel safely on the roads. Automobiles already come outfitted with factory headlights, but what happens when we want or need more? Factory headlights are typically less potent and this can be a negative factor, especially throughout poor weather. You require a pair of headlights that allow you to see through mist and fog. This is the main explanation why a whole lot of folks decide for projector headlights.

Projector headlights are quite comparable to the factory kinds. They're connected to the auto front, just like normal headlights and they offer a much more effective beam. A great deal of men and women take into account them crucial for the protection of the passengers and motorists. One more fantastic factor about them is that they take in minor electricity thanks to the reality that they're connected to the automobile circuits. You really should also know that projector headlights appear in a extensive range of forms, these kinds of as euro headlights, halo projector headlights, HID headlights and Xenon headlights. These are all distinct but they have the exact same part.

An additional crucial factor that you should now about headlights projector is that they arrive in two distinctive kinds, high and reduced beam. As you can certainly picture, reduced beam headlights have considerably less energy and feature a a lot more scattered gentle beam. Higher beams are considerably a lot more extreme and they penetrate fog and mist a good deal greater. Projector headlights also characteristic really smooth and modern patterns and can absolutely boost the search of your vehicle. In reality, this is another essential explanation why they're so opted for at the minute. Projector headlights also appear in a broad assortment of shades and designs.

Typically, people that love beautiful vehicles are also extremely fond of headlights projector. Some headlight versions require special lenses in order to distribute the mild evenly, even though others control to do it right. This is dependent on the model of the projector headlight and the style. As a basic assistance, really don't fail to remember to get amber paper immediately after acquiring these headlights. The amber paper is extremely expense efficient and is needed to use for security rules. Be confident to get a qualified to put in them since the procedure is not an simple one.

How to Commence an Airbrush Tanning Business

In regions the place the beautiful sunny days are not all 12 months-spherical or there is a problem amongst people for a safe option to solar broken epidermis, a ideal possibility exists for you to start-up an straightforward and worthwhile airbrush tanning organization venture.

It may possibly sound like a hard or expensive company to enter, but with a little understanding, you can truly start an airbrush tanning business with a minimum investment decision in time and income. Airbrush tanning devices is made up primarily of an airbrush gun, an air compressor, and the tanning solution. Using the airbrush needs really small training, if you have utilised aerosol spray paint, you presently have an notion of how easy this endeavor can be.

The standard guidelines to airbrush tanning is to implement the tanning resolution in gentle even strokes about 6" away from the human body, overlapping as you go, being watchful not to concentrate your spray in any one particular region. A continual motion with the airbrush gun will guarantee uniform coverage. Certain regions like elbows or knees where the pores and skin may be rough, will call for a lighter in weight application. A great follow session on your self or a near friend will aid you perfect your techniques.

Once you have mastered the airbrush technique, you can then examine possible locations to carry out your new airbrush tanning company. As a start off-up enterprise, funds bills may be limited, so you want to locate economical areas to offer your companies. There are a number of areas to begin. An perfect spot is your regional flea market place you can effortlessly set up a booth, with a coated canopy and show signage and goods to promote your organization. You can offer to do simple spray tanning right at the flea market place!

Another chance is to get in touch with local attractiveness salons and ask to sublet place in their store as an additional value reward to their company. You cold also provide to break up earnings with the salon. Ideally, if you could secure about three or 4 salons and offer you your services on various times or occasions by appointment, you would be maximizing your potential for sales.

It would be crucial prior to you determine to make a sales get in touch with, to have enterprise cards printed and a income brochure with photos and a entire description of the companies you are planning to offer.

You can also set up a little store in your property, if you have available area and local zoning codes do not prohibit you from carrying out so. Only your imagination can limit your likely in the inexpensive and lucrative airbrush tanning organization.

Wonder How to Purify Faucet Water? Uncover the Mystery!

If you're wondering how to purify faucet drinking water, the reply is straightforward: set up a residence drinking water purification or filtration method.

The tougher query is: which 1?

There are dozens of companies, and hundreds of techniques. The two most well-known techniques are "reverse osmosis" and "carbon filtration". There are others, such as "steam distillation", but they're not as widely utilised because of to larger charge and significantly less usefulness.

<b>Reverse Osmosis</b> Reverse osmosis programs, often referred to as "RO systems", power h2o via a membrane, basically a filter, that has microscopic pores just huge enough for water molecules to slip by means of. Most contaminants in drinking water are greater than a drinking water molecule, so they can't make it by way of, and they get flushed down the drain.

Some of the contaminants, although, are more compact than drinking water molecules, so they slide appropriate on by way of with the water. These are the VOCs ("Unstable Organic Compounds" which are formed when chlorine reacts with organic and natural materials in the drinking water, and when some organic and natural compounds like gasoline, fertilizers, pesticides and many others., break down into less complicated ingredients.

Most VOC's are pretty toxic, horrible compounds, so the manufacturers of reverse osmosis systems include activated carbon filters to seize them. So it really is good to say that however reverse osmosis doesn't get rid of VOC's, reverse osmosis "systems" do.

They also get rid of chlorine, guide, and parasitic cysts.

In reality, RO techniques are so excellent at taking away factors, that they even remove the minerals, like calcium, magnesium, and potassium that our bodies need to have and that make drinking water flavor great. This leaves the water tasting "flat", in accordance to most men and women.

The procedure is gradual, due to the fact only a small part of the h2o can make it through the very small pores, so a storage tank is necessary, which takes up a fair quantity of room below the sink. Also, a wonderful quantity of h2o is squandered-amongst 3 and ten gallons goes down the drain for every gallon purified.

<b>Carbon Filtering</b> These methods pass the water via a extremely-compressed block of activated carbon. This carbon block has an amazing sum of surface region and small passages that filter out the impurities. It also has a slight good electrical cost, so it draws in and holds the contaminants, which have unfavorable charges.

Carbon filtration models, in addition to filtering out the VOCs, also get rid of chlorine, direct, and parasitic cysts, just like RO systems.

They don't filter out the minerals, and they don't waste water like reverse osmosis programs.

Quite good carbon purification methods commence at about $a hundred-quite a bit less than even reduced-finish RO programs. They create clear, filtered water at about $.ten per gallon, compared to about $.twenty five-$.35 per gallon for reverse osmosis methods.

As I investigated how to purify tap water, I speedily arrived to the conclusion that an triggered carbon filter was the way to go. I ordered the unit rated "Greatest Buy" six several years in a row by Consumers Digest Magazine.
